original_text: But the king of Assyria found treachery in Hoshea, for he had sent messengers to So, king of Egypt, and offered no tribute to the king of Assyria, as he had done year by year. Therefore the king of Assyria shut him up and bound him in prison.
korean_text: 그가 애굽의 왕 소에게 사자들을 보내고 해마다 하던 대로 앗수르 왕에게 조공을 드리지 아니하매 앗수르 왕이 호세아가 배반함을 보고 그를 옥에 감금하여 두고

sentences.original_text: But the king of Assyria found treachery in Hoshea
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 앗수르 왕은 호세아의 배신을 알게 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: for he had sent messengers to So, king of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 사, 애굽 왕에게 사신들을 보냈기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and offered no tribute to the king of Assyria
as he had done year by year
Therefore the king of Assyria shut him up
